participant_1.background:
I checked my pulse multiple times a day to make sure I'm not dying.
I spend my days reading, playing, and eating ice cream with my friends and partner.
I don't have any siblings, but I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.
i am slightly overweight , but my doctors say i m healthy.
I remember buying my first baseball card when I was 8 years old.

participant_2.background:
I am a software engineer, but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time.
My favorite people are my family and the customers I clean for.
I enjoy eating at the local pub on sunny days after a round of golf with my friends.
i used to cheerlead in high school.
my dad works offshore.

content.text: Doing okay, thanks! I spent the day reading and playing with my dog. What did you do today?
I went for a round of golf with my friends and then ate at our local pub. It was a beautiful day, so we enjoyed being outside.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not very good at golf, but I enjoy playing it.
It's not my favorite sport, but it's a good way to spend time with friends.
I agree. What do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer, but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time.
That's cool! I'm not very good at makeup, but I like to watch tutorials too.
Have you ever tried to do your own makeup?
I have, but I'm not very good at it. I usually just stick to the basics.
That's okay! Everyone has to start somewhere.
True! Do you have any siblings?
I have one brother, but we don't talk very often.
Oh, that's too bad. I have two brothers, and we're pretty close.
I'm glad you have a good relationship with your brothers.
